cause.description:
In order to help others be inspired and have hope they matter, empowerment is key.
Microlending and microfinance, in general, have proven to reap large benefits of impact and give opportunity to those who want to change their lives for the better through starting their own business. This is powerful!
1. capital in developing countries is scarce and hard to cultivate without momentum
2. empowerment and accountability provide and impetus for hope and change.
3. giving through sites like kiva.org will provide a convenient means for people to fight poverty and make a large impact on others
cause.mission: Get others interested in this Web 2.0 way to help people in poor nations have opportunity through microlending.
cause.name: Empower Entrepreneurs in developing nations to rise from poverty!
